response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by us due to its high-quality materials, innovative features, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Considering its unparalleled benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $140. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while offering you an attractive deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product.", "product_price": 140}
